titles.title: Lake Traverse Reservation Act Amendments of 2006
A bill to amend Public Law 98-513 to provide for the inheritance of small fractional interests within the Lake Traverse Indian Reservation.
Lake Traverse Reservation Act Amendments of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: Lake Traverse Reservation Act Amendments of 2006 - Amends federal Indian law to provide for the inheritance of small fractional interests within the Lake Traverse Indian Reservation.
